306571.「これが キリカの草餅……。\n ずいぶんと 大きいですが 香りは\n お師匠様:
So this is a Kirika Rice Cake... It's quite
large, but the smell is just the same as the
rice cakes that my master would make for me.

306573.「これは……間違いありません。 \n かつて ヤマカミヌで お師匠様が私に\n:
There's...no mistaking it. This tastes just
the same as the ones my master used to
make for me back in Yamakaminu.

306574.「草餅を たくさん作りました。\n 日持ちするので 戦場に 持っていきなさい。:
I've made many rice cakes for you. They should
last you for some time, so please take them
along to the battlefield.

306576.「……ひとりで 災厄の王へ挑むのですね。:
...you're going to take on the King of
Calamity alone, aren't you?

306577.「……もう 共に戦ったあいつは いませんから。:
...he who I used to fight alongside is no
longer here.

306578.「私の友プクラスが 災厄の王から生き残るため\n 脱出計画を 指揮しています。\:
My friend Pukulas is leading an escape plan to
survive against the King of Calamity. Master,
please evacuate with him.

306579.「こんな時に 私の心配など無用ですよ。:
You've no need to worry about me at a time
like this.

306580.「私は この地に残ります。\n そして 取りのこされた人々を集めて\n チカラを:
I'll remain here, and will gather any
survivors. We'll stand a better chance of
survival if we stay together.

306581.「ふふ……。\n その草餅が 何という草から作られているか\n あなたに 話した:
Hehe... Did I ever tell you what kind of grass
those rice cakes are made from?

306582.「いえ……ないと思います。: No...I can't say that you have.

306583.「その草餅は ニガユリという草から\n 作られているんです。ニガユリ草は\n ど:
It's made from something called Bitterlily.
That grass is quite resilient, and can take
root just about anywhere.

306584.「国が滅びようと 私も ニガユリ草のように\n 何としても 生き抜いてみせます。:
Even if this country is to perish, I will be just like that grass and do whatever it takes to survive. You needn't worry about me
while fighting.

306585.「あなたは 子供の頃から 私の草餅が\n 大好きでしたね。:
You have loved my rice cakes ever since you
were little.

306586.「その草餅が 少しでもあなたのチカラに\n なりますよう 武運を 祈っています。:
I pray that those rice cakes will contribute
to your efforts even just a little, and bring
you good fortune.

306588.「とても……懐かしい味です。\n まさか お師匠様の草餅が食べられるなんて\n:
The taste...it's so nostalgic. Never did I
think I'd be able to taste my master's
rice cakes again.

306589.「私の国は滅びても 私達の生きた証は\n ６０００年の時を超え 今の人々に\n:
My country may have perished, but the proof of
our lives has transcended over 6000 years, and
is passed on to those living today...

306590.「やはり私は 死ぬわけにはいきません。: After all, I cannot afford to die.

306591.「この草餅のおかげで 考えが変わりました。\n 私は 何としても この戦いを生き:
This rice cake has changed my perspective. I'm
determined to live through this battle at any
cost, and fulfill my promise to Kourin.

306592.「イヨリ大僧正様。\n わざわざ キリカの草餅を作ってくださって\n ありがとう:
High Priest Iyori...
Thank you so much for taking the time to make
these Kirika Rice Cakes.

306593.「<pc>さん あなたと地上に来られて\n 本当によかった。おかげで戦いへの覚悟:
I'm glad I was able to come to the surface with you, . Because of you, I was able to find my determination for battle.
Let's return to the Firmament.
